timeline.message:
Fix performance test warmup

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

timeline.bodyText:
You should add a comment here. Initially I thought this was a mistake and it should be !addressBoo. However, I get that you removed the fileData persistence from AddressBookService back to here
Also does this check need the addressBook boolean check, since 'entityId.getEntityNum() < 1000' will be true?
timeline.author: Nana-EC

replies.bodyText: I can add a comment. We need the check still since less than 1000 is behind a persist flag and we always want to persist address books.
replies.author: steven-sheehy
